CustomField.description: The funds where the Account has an LPAC status. Right now it's a manual field, but could use Roll up helper to pull the field from the won Opportunity records. Should say [Fund name - LPAC Status] so we know if they are an observer or an actual member.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The funds where the Account has an LPAC status. Right now it's a manual field, but could use Roll up helper to pull the field from the won Opportunity records.
CustomField.label: LPAC Status
